name: Acrobat
description: A path focused on agility and mobility

skills.name: Acrobatic Defense
skills.description: When you use an action to move, you gain +2 to your Defense until the start of your next turn.

skills.name: Tumble
skills.description: When a creature attacks you and gets a 0 on the attack roll, you can use a triggered action to move up to your Speed.

skills.name: Graceful Recovery
skills.description: When you use Catch Your Breath, you can move up to half your Speed without using an action.

skills.name: Improved Acrobatic Defense
skills.description: When you use an action to move, you gain +3 to your Defense until the start of your next turn.
